name: bookbyblock-monorepo
description: Web3 Anti-Scalping Ticketing Platform - Enterprise Blockchain Solution

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:contracts && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:scanner
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:blockchain" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:scanner
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network mumbai
scripts.test:all: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:contracts && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: BookByBlock Team
